import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Form, Button, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap" import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import Message from "../components/Message" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import { login } from "../actions/userAction" import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' function LoginScreen() { const [email,setEmail] = useState(''); const [password,setPassword] = useState(''); const location = useLocation() // const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1] : '/' const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() //Dispatch login } return (

Sign in
